phrases: Onii-chan, could you get me a drink?
You could at least get your own drink.
I know she is off today,
but she is really lazing around to the fullest.
She should at least get the stuff she wants herself.
Could you bring me my potato chips?
Is it okay to throw away this box that is on the floor?
I do not need any boxes that are lying on the floor.
I just wanted to call you.
You should stop lazing around and get up now.
I am taking out the trash.
Oh, could you pick up Young Jumpu at the convenience store while you are out?
O-Onii-chan, have you seen the box that was on the bookshelf?
various facial expression parts in that box.
Uh, I threw that away this morning.
Wh-Why did you throw it away?!
Well, you said I could throw it away.
I do not need any boxes that are lying on the floor.
Well, I did not really like the parts that figure had, so it does not really matter.
I-Is that something it will not work without?
How could you throw it away?!
Why did not you look in the box first?!
That was really important to me!
Maybe now I can laze around and not get yelled at.
I am going to let him have it some more.
Well, I went to look for the doll I threw away,
but they did not have Hatsune whatever.
Onii-chan, they do not sell figures at a Japanese doll store.
You are going to be late to work.
Are you sure that doll is okay?
It is totally different from the one I threw away, right?
I did not even care that you threw it away.
I just wanted to call you.
This is the first time you have invited us out to eat, Ebina-chan.
so I thought I would repay you for the restaurant the other day.
Umaru seems pretty happy about this.
Probably because I have prohibited instant ramen at home.
Does that mean their ramen is pretty heavy?
If possible, I would prefer something lighter...
Could you order either this or this, and just share a little with me?
Two double garlic ramen, Arashi, and one red hot death ramen!
It is really heavy, not to mention really oily.
And the garlic makes the soup extremely rich.
The pork back fat and garlic run around in my mouth.
But that is why it is great!
Umaru-chan even eats ramen in such a pretty way.
But I have never seen her eat something like this.
I wonder if she is just putting up with it.
I really want to eat this with cola...
You cannot eat wasabi, but you are okay with chili peppers?
You cannot eat spicy stuff, Onii-chan?
No, that was just especially spicy.
I would love for the three of us to go again.
So we worked hard making nothing but ramen,
and the shop just got covered in oil.
Do not you think it is messed up?
For someone to come to a mixer when she has a boyfriend...
It is totally against the rules!
Hey, could I get another draft?!
Look, is that what you wanted to talk about?
Then I would like to go ho
There is something I want to ask you, Taihei.
You are totally living with your girlfriend, are not you?
I always thought it was weird.
You go straight home after work, you do not go to mixers or hostess clubs...
You do not even go to girls' bars!
What the hell is a girls' bar?
People in our office have seen you walking with a hot young girl!
They are probably talking about my sister.
No one goes shopping with their sister!
I cannot go on knowing that you have a woman!
Can I come over after this?
It is always exciting going over to a friend's house.
I did not tell him he could follow me...
Well, I guess it is better than having weird rumors going around.
I am sure once he meets her at the door, he will be convinced and go home.
Hey, you are being too loud.
I feel like the wound on my heart has been soothed.
I am just going to look.
It is not like you lose anything from it, so come on!
Onii-chan's head exploded and got huge!
I have to pull it out!
I have to pull it out!
Your Onii-chan will give you a piggyback ride.
Do not come in here without permission!
Cannot you even read no trespassing, you exploded gorilla?!
want to go to an old-timey candy store!
A ten-yen game covered in rust!
A Monkey Kong machine with a sunshade!
The capsule machines are broken and the sides are coming apart!
And there are still things inside!
This is a true candy store!
I commend you for knowing about this shop.
I found it about six months ago.
The place is open, but I am not sure if they are actually in business.
I do not see anyone working.
But if the door's open, it must mean they are open for business.
Let us pick out some candy.
I am sure someone will come out.
This is that Cola Drinko that calls itself cola despite not having any carbonation!
They are totally different, but the word cola is tempting me!
Though it is an old-fashioned candy store,
I have see many of these at convenience stores.
Please yell Obaa-chan as loud as you can.
(There is a chance I might be sleeping.)
I can get all of these, and it will not cost me 500 yen.
Did you see any of those little yogurts shaped like this anywhere?
They come with a wooden spoon.
They were not up at the front?
I think I saw a stock of them under here.
Maybe the owner's in the back.
They have not come out at all.
Please yell Obaa-chan as loud as you can.
(There is a chance I might be sleeping.)
Let us yell it at the same time, so it will be even louder.
I have not had one in a while, but Yogure is great.
Umaru, do not eat potato chips first thing in the morning.
You sound like a mom, Onii-chan.
YOU-Um, uh, have a good day.
Bomber, we just got to the office.
Yeah, I usually get a boost in the afternoon.
Could I ask for your assistance?
You two really need to stop.
Well, I finished up earlier than usual,
so maybe I will go to the supermarket, then make dinner...
This is a residential area, so it is hard to tell...
Do I go back the way I came, or keep moving forward?
I remember seeing this sign with Umaru.
I have been down this road before...
Which means it will lead to a road that I know.
I guess I will keep going.
But I cannot remember at all.
If I came here with Umaru...
I do not go out with her much, though.
Actually, she does not come outside much in general.
If it was after I became a salaryman...
It is been about five years since I started working...
I keep doing the same thing every day,
so it is no wonder I forget things from the past.
It must be around dinner time.
I think the last time I went this way,
it was around the same time of day.
I was hungry, so I wanted to hurry home.
But Umaru always throws a tantrum at times like that.
Why did Umaru just call me Taihei-kun?
I guess I will go home and ask Umaru.
First, I need to get to the main street.
Then I will get a better idea of where I am.
You are the cat from earlier, are not you?
Are you here because the cannery's nearby?
The school's the other way, so home is this way.
I will make Umaru something better than potato chips.
Episode 8 Umaru and Christmas and New Year's
Gosh, anime's truly amazing, is not it?
I should be meeting you soon, Umaru-san.
Those who cannot wait, please read volume 4.
Oh, you are just here to advertise.
